iPad 2

screen.width        768
screen.height       1024
devicePixelRatio    1


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=768,
        view=full

innerWidth          768
innerHeight         927


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=768,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          768
innerHeight         984


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=3072,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          3072
innerHeight         3936


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=1024,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1024
innerHeight         728


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=4096,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          4096
innerHeight         2912
